title: PCl5 equil. - forward rxn rate approaching equil.

content.question: As the reaction progresses toward equilibrium, the rate of the forward reaction

choices.label: increases until it becomes the same as the reverse reaction rate at equilibrium
stays constant before and after equilibrium is reached
decreases to become a constant nonzero rate at equilibrium
decreases to become zero at equilibrium

content.answer: decreases to become a constant nonzero rate at equilibrium

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
